attributes.action: Allow small pets up to 8kg to fly in the cabin next to there owner
attributes.additional_details:
Please change this ancient low and go on the same side with most of the EU countries, and let us travel freerly with our beloved friend, next to us side be side.
Pets are part of the family not luggage.
attributes.background: Pets are part of our family. Are like child's for most of us, and we really love to take them with us abroad in our holidays. Most of the EU allow to have the dog with you in the cabin if is small enough to fit in a airplane standard carrier but not the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650194
